name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Unique identifier for this Contract or a derivative that references a Source Contract.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Unique identifier for this Contract or a derivative that references a Source Contract.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Unique identifier for this Contract or a derivative that references a Source Contract.

name: $url
desc: Returns: Canonical identifier for this contract, represented as a URI (globally unique).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Canonical identifier for this contract, represented as a URI (globally unique).

name: $::version
desc: Returns: An edition identifier used for business purposes to label business significant variants.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An edition identifier used for business purposes to label business significant variants.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the resource instance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

name: $legalState
desc: Returns: Legal states of the formation of a legal instrument, which is a formally executed written document that can be formally attributed to its author, records and formally expresses a legally enforceable act, process, or contractual duty, obligation, or right, and therefore evidences that act, process, or agreement.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Legal states of the formation of a legal instrument, which is a formally executed written document that can be formally attributed to its author, records and formally expresses a legally enforceable act, process, or contractual duty, obligation, or right,

name: $instantiatesCanonical
desc: Returns: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined Contract Definition that is adhered to in whole or part by this Contract.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined Contract Definition that is adhered to in whole or part by this Contract.

name: $instantiatesUri
desc: Returns: The URL pointing to an externally maintained definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Contract.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally maintained definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Contract.

name: $contentDerivative
desc: Returns: The minimal content derived from the basal information source at a specific stage in its lifecycle.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The minimal content derived from the basal information source at a specific stage in its lifecycle.

name: $issued
desc: Returns: When this  Contract was issued.

name: $applies
desc: Returns: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract is applicable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract is applicable.

name: $expirationType
desc: Returns: Event resulting in discontinuation or termination of this Contract instance by one or more parties to the contract.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Event resulting in discontinuation or termination of this Contract instance by one or more parties to the contract.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The target entity impacted by or of interest to parties to the agreement.

name: $addsubject
desc: The target entity impacted by or of interest to parties to the agreement.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The target entity impacted by or of interest to parties to the agreement.

name: $authority
desc: Returns: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people, principals, organizations, or jurisdictions formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action such as the promulgation, administration and enforcement of contracts and policies.

name: $addauthority
desc: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people, principals, organizations, or jurisdictions formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action such as the promulgation, administration and enforcement of contracts and policies.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people, principals, organizations, or jurisdictions formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action such as the promulgation, administration and enforcement of contracts and policies.

name: $domain
desc: Returns: Recognized governance framework or system operating with a circumscribed scope in accordance with specified principles, policies, processes or procedures for managing rights, actions, or behaviors of parties or principals relative to resources.

name: $adddomain
desc: Recognized governance framework or system operating with a circumscribed scope in accordance with specified principles, policies, processes or procedures for managing rights, actions, or behaviors of parties or principals relative to resources.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Recognized governance framework or system operating with a circumscribed scope in accordance with specified principles, policies, processes or procedures for managing rights, actions, or behaviors of parties or principals relative to resources.

name: $site
desc: Returns: Sites in which the contract is complied with,  exercised, or in force.

name: $addsite
desc: Sites in which the contract is complied with,  exercised, or in force.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Sites in which the contract is complied with,  exercised, or in force.

name: $::name
desc: Returns: A natural language name identifying this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state. Provides additional information about its content. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state. Provides additional information about its content. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such

name: $title
desc: Returns: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.t giving additional information about its content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.t giving additional information about its content.

name: $subtitle
desc: Returns: An explanatory or alternate user-friendly title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.t giving additional information about its content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An explanatory or alternate user-friendly title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.t giving additional information about its content.

name: $alias
desc: Returns: Alternative representation of the title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state., e.g., a domain specific contract number related to legislation.

name: $addalias
desc: Alternative representation of the title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state., e.g., a domain specific contract number related to legislation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Alternative representation of the title for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state., e.g., a domain specific contract number related to legislation.

name: $author
desc: Returns: The individual or organization that authored the Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The individual or organization that authored the Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

name: $scope
desc: Returns: A selector of legal concerns for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A selector of legal concerns for this Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: A high-level category for the legal instrument, whether constructed as a Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.  Provides additional information about its content within the context of the Contract's scope to distinguish the kinds of systems that would be interested in the contract.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A high-level category for the legal instrument, whether constructed as a Contract definition, derivative, or instance in any legal state.  Provides additional information about its content within the context of the Contract's scope to distinguish the kind

name: $subType
desc: Returns: Sub-category for the Contract that distinguishes the kinds of systems that would be interested in the Contract within the context of the Contract's scope.

name: $addsubType
desc: Sub-category for the Contract that distinguishes the kinds of systems that would be interested in the Contract within the context of the Contract's scope.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Sub-category for the Contract that distinguishes the kinds of systems that would be interested in the Contract within the context of the Contract's scope.

name: $contentDefinition
desc: Returns: Precusory content developed with a focus and intent of supporting the formation a Contract instance, which may be associated with and transformable into a Contract.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Precusory content developed with a focus and intent of supporting the formation a Contract instance, which may be associated with and transformable into a Contract.

name: $term
desc: Returns: One or more Contract Provisions, which may be related and conveyed as a group, and may contain nested groups.

name: $addterm
desc: One or more Contract Provisions, which may be related and conveyed as a group, and may contain nested groups.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: One or more Contract Provisions, which may be related and conveyed as a group, and may contain nested groups.

name: $supportingInfo
desc: Returns: Information that may be needed by/relevant to the performer in their execution of this term action.

name: $addsupportingInfo
desc: Information that may be needed by/relevant to the performer in their execution of this term action.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Information that may be needed by/relevant to the performer in their execution of this term action.

name: $relevantHistory
desc: Returns: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this Contract definition, derivative, or instance, which identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the Contract.  The Provence.entity indicates the target that was changed in the update. http://build.fhir.org/provenance-definitions.html#Provenance.entity.

name: $addrelevantHistory
desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this Contract definition, derivative, or instance, which identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the Contract.  The Provence.entity indicates the target that was changed in the update. http://build.fhir.org/provenance-definitions.html#Provenance.entity.

name: $signer
desc: Returns: Parties with legal standing in the Contract, including the principal parties, the grantor(s) and grantee(s), which are any person or organization bound by the contract, and any ancillary parties, which facilitate the execution of the contract such as a notary or witness.

name: $addsigner
desc: Parties with legal standing in the Contract, including the principal parties, the grantor(s) and grantee(s), which are any person or organization bound by the contract, and any ancillary parties, which facilitate the execution of the contract such as a notary or witness.

lvardefs.name: objRef

name: $friendly
desc: Returns: The "patient friendly language" versionof the Contract in whole or in parts. "Patient friendly language" means the representation of the Contract and Contract Provisions in a manner that is readily accessible and understandable by a layperson in accordance with best practices for communication styles that ensure that those agreeing to or signing the Contract understand the roles, actions, obligations, responsibilities, and implication of the agreement.

name: $addfriendly
desc: The "patient friendly language" versionof the Contract in whole or in parts. "Patient friendly language" means the representation of the Contract and Contract Provisions in a manner that is readily accessible and understandable by a layperson in accordance with best practices for communication styles that ensure that those agreeing to or signing the Contract understand the roles, actions, obligations, responsibilities, and implication of the agreement.

name: $legal
desc: Returns: List of Legal expressions or representations of this Contract.

name: $addlegal
desc: List of Legal expressions or representations of this Contract.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: List of Legal expressions or representations of this Contract.

name: $rule
desc: Returns: List of Computable Policy Rule Language Representations of this Contract.
